title: Changes of the Heart
description: When you're left with nothing at all, all you have left is to rebuild. Can losing everything bring two people together to make a new family? Gabe Lost his family on 9/11 and himself in the process. Juliette was left homeless with a small child after the child's father abandoned them. Will an icy collision bring these two to a happily ever after or are they too broken?
author: Michele Richard
